pages.text: The Cooking Pot is the cornerstone of any aspiring chef's kitchen. Place ingredients in the pot, and if the recipes match, you will begin cooking. Some recipes may require a bowl to take out of the pot. Higher-quality meals may grant additional effects.
The Tea Kettle is great for making many soothing drinks. Works similarly to the cooking pot, but also requires water. Drinks from the Tea Kettle are a great substitute for potions.

A Skillet can be placed on top of any heat source to smelt a stack of one item at once. Skillets are made of aluminum, a relatively rare metal from underground. Also serves as a surprisingly effective weapon; it can be enchanted as if it were a sword.
